title: Heart Disease Prediction (Machine Learning)
description: A complete project to build and train a machine learning model to predict the likelihood of heart disease with high accuracy.

title: Hindawi Library Data Analysis
description: Extracting and analyzing data from over 3,444 free and legal books using Python to facilitate access to rich content.

title: E-commerce Customer Analysis (RFM)
description: Analyzing customer behavior in an online store and segmenting them into strategic groups based on their purchasing transactions.

title: Breast Cancer Prediction (Machine Learning)
description: Building a model to classify breast tumors (malignant or benign) with 98% accuracy using machine learning algorithms.
